physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a man posing in front of a building. The man adorns a military uniform and has his hands in his pockets
 looking towards the direction in which the photograph was captured. The tower of the building in the background can be seen
 as well as its decorated façade with arch tops. To the left
 a vehicle is parked and two people are walking towards the entrance of the building.

metadata.title_text: Roy, September 1946 at Goodwood Park Hotel Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a man posing in front of a building. The man adorns a military uniform and has his hands in his pockets, looking towards the direction in which the photograph was captured. The tower of the building in the background can be seen, as well as its decorated façade with arch tops. To the left, a vehicle is parked and two people are walking towards the entrance of the building.
